content=Experience the golden sands, colourful batiks and cresting waves of Hikkaduwa, a beautiful seaside town on the southern coastline of Sri Lanka. Situated directly on the beach, Coral Rock by Amaya is an idyllic haven
for beach lovers and those who wish to explore the unique local culture of the surrounding area with it unspoiled coastline, rich marine life and the nearby Yala Game Sanctuary. As the sun sets, the hitherto placid Narigama
beach transforms itself, revealing the vibrant nightlife that Hikkaduwa is famous for.

After a day of exploration, return to the welcoming comforts of a boutique, luxury resort, where antique detailing and modern amenities seamlessly merge to create inspired interiors. Soak up the spectacular views as you dine on freshly-caught seafood at our signature restaurant, or retreat to the cozy bar and lounge area for a quiet drink and warm conversation.
